name: part_010
file: tmp_【#ときのそらお披露目生誕祭】アイドルになりたいわたしの生誕祭！【ホロライブ⧸ときのそら】 [gL6HizKO-Gc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Idol' by YOASOBI.
Performance of the song 'Pare Pare Pare'.
MC section where Tokino Sora reveals a new costume with a jacket.
Performance of the song 'Our Bright Parade'.

subtitles.original: …嘘つきな君は
subtitles.english: ...you, the liar,

subtitles.original: 天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: are a genius idol.

subtitles.original:
アイドル
作詞・作曲：Ayase
subtitles.english:
Idol
Lyrics & Composition: Ayase

subtitles.original: 今日何食べた？好きな本は？
subtitles.english: What did you eat today? What's your favorite book?

subtitles.original: 遊びに行くならどこに行くの？
subtitles.english: Where do you go when you go out to play?

subtitles.original: 何も食べてない それは内緒
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten anything. That's a secret.

subtitles.original: 何を聞かれてものらりくらり
subtitles.english: No matter what you're asked, you're elusive.

subtitles.original: そう淡々と だけど燦々と
subtitles.english: So nonchalant, yet so brilliant.

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない秘密は蜜の味
subtitles.english: A secret just out of reach tastes like honey.

subtitles.original: あれもないないない
subtitles.english: That's not there, not there, not there.

subtitles.original: これもないないない
subtitles.english: This is not there, not there, not there.

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？ 相手は？ さあ答えて
subtitles.english: What's your type? Who is it? Come on, answer me.

subtitles.original: 「誰かを好きになることなんて私分からなくてさ」
subtitles.english: "I don't really know what it's like to fall in love."

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ない
subtitles.english: Whether it's a lie or the truth, I'll never know.

subtitles.original: そんな言葉にまた一人堕ちる
subtitles.english: With those words, another person falls for you.

subtitles.original: また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: You make them love you again.

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく
subtitles.english: Everyone's eyes are drawn to you.

subtitles.original: 君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: You are the perfect and ultimate idol.

subtitles.original: 金輪際現れない
subtitles.english: You'll never appear again.

subtitles.original: 一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: The reincarnation of the first star.

subtitles.original: あ、その笑顔で愛してるで
subtitles.english: Ah, with that smile, saying "I love you,"

subtitles.original: 誰も彼も虜にしていく
subtitles.english: you captivate everyone.

subtitles.original: その瞳が その言葉が
subtitles.english: Those eyes, those words,

subtitles.original: 嘘でもそれは完全なアイ
subtitles.english: even if they're lies, it's perfect love.

subtitles.original: はいはいあの子は特別です
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that girl is special.

subtitles.original: 我々は端からおまけです
subtitles.english: We're just extras from the start.

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Bです
subtitles.english: We're the background character B to the star.

subtitles.original: 全てがあの子のおかげなわけない
subtitles.english: Everything can't be thanks to her.

subtitles.original: 洒落臭い 妬み嫉妬なんてないわけがない
subtitles.english: It's irritating. There's no way there isn't envy and jealousy.

subtitles.original: これはネタじゃない からこそ許せない
subtitles.english: This isn't a joke. That's why I can't forgive it.

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃない 君じゃ許せない
subtitles.english: You're not perfect. I can't forgive you.

subtitles.original: 自分を許せない 誰よりも強い君以外は認めない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive myself. I won't acknowledge anyone but you, who are stronger than anyone.

subtitles.original: 誰もが信じ崇めてる
subtitles.english: Everyone believes in and worships you.

subtitles.original: まさに最強で無敵のアイドル
subtitles.english: The truly strongest and invincible idol.

subtitles.original: 弱点なんて見当たらない
subtitles.english: No weaknesses can be found.

subtitles.original: 一番星を宿している
subtitles.english: You harbor the first star.

subtitles.original: 弱いとこなんて見せちゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: Don't show your weak side, no, no.

subtitles.original: 知りたくないとこは見せずに
subtitles.english: Without showing the parts they don't want to know.

subtitles.original: 唯一無二じゃなくちゃイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: I hate it if you're not one of a kind.

subtitles.original: それこそ本物のアイ
subtitles.english: That is true love.

subtitles.original: 得意の笑顔で沸かすメディア
subtitles.english: Rousing the media with your specialty smile.

subtitles.original: 隠し切るこの秘密だけは
subtitles.english: Only this secret will be hidden completely.

subtitles.original: 愛してるって嘘で積むキャリア
subtitles.english: A career built on the lie of "I love you."

subtitles.original: これこそ私なりの愛だ
subtitles.english: This is my own kind of love.

subtitles.original: 流れる汗も綺麗なアクア
subtitles.english: The sweat that flows is beautiful aqua.

subtitles.original: ルビーを隠したこの瞼
subtitles.english: These eyelids that hide rubies.

subtitles.original: 歌い踊り舞う私はマリア
subtitles.english: Singing, dancing, and performing, I am Maria.

subtitles.original: そう嘘はとびきりの愛だ
subtitles.english: Yes, lies are the ultimate love.

subtitles.original: 誰かに愛されたことも
subtitles.english: The fact that I've never been loved by anyone,

subtitles.original: 誰かのこと愛したことも
subtitles.english: or loved anyone either.

subtitles.original: ないそんな私の嘘が
subtitles.english: I believe that one day my lies

subtitles.original: いつか本当になること
subtitles.english: will become the truth.

subtitles.original: 信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe it.

subtitles.original: いつかきっと全部手に入れる
subtitles.english: One day I'll surely have it all.

subtitles.original: 私はそう欲張りなアイドル
subtitles.english: I am such a greedy idol.

subtitles.original: 等身大でみんなのこと
subtitles.english: Because I want to love everyone

subtitles.original: ちゃんと愛したいから
subtitles.english: just as I am.

subtitles.original: 今日も嘘をつくの
subtitles.english: I'll tell lies again today.

subtitles.original: この言葉がいつか本当になる日を願って
subtitles.english: Hoping that these words will one day become true.

subtitles.original: それでもまだ
subtitles.english: Even so, I still

subtitles.original: 君と君にだけは言えずにいたけど
subtitles.english: couldn't say it to you and you.

subtitles.original: あ、やっと言えた
subtitles.english: Ah, I finally said it.

subtitles.original: これは絶対嘘じゃない
subtitles.english: This is definitely not a lie.

subtitles.original: 愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original:
パレ・パレ・パレ
作詞・作曲：堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
Pare Pare Pare
Lyrics & Composition: Shota Horie

subtitles.original: パレ・パレ・パレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare, pare, pare, it's going to shine.

subtitles.original: 呼び合う声を合図に
subtitles.english: With the voices calling each other as a signal.

subtitles.original: パレ・パレ・パレ 探しに行く
subtitles.english: Pare, pare, pare, I'm going to look for it.

subtitles.original: スターとは何だったって
subtitles.english: What a star was.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！二つ目の衣装はこれだー！
subtitles.english: Yay! My second outfit is this!

subtitles.original: ジャケット！ワーイ！
subtitles.english: A jacket! Yay!

subtitles.original: タラー！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: 独り言 綴った
subtitles.english: I wrote down my soliloquy.

subtitles.original: ただ 始まりたくて走った
subtitles.english: I just ran because I wanted things to start.

subtitles.original: 遠く 暗がりに灯った
subtitles.english: Far away, it lit up in the darkness.

subtitles.original: それは 眩しすぎた名前
subtitles.english: That was a name that was too bright.

subtitles.original: それは 優しすぎる思い出
subtitles.english: Those were memories that were too kind.

subtitles.original: もっと 近づけと手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out my hand to get closer.
